forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 53F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 11C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 8C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 53F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 48F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 48F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
